TopicTitle: Moon Rocks and Tall Grass Is There Any More Like This?

Articles.Content: So as the title suggests are there any things like the rocks on the mun and the tall grass on kerbin. Also there is a pic of tall grass atached to the post.

Yes, there are, but it depends on your terrain scatter density in the settings page. With 100% you'll need an extreme computer to deal with the lag it makes, but you'll have thousands of trees, tall grasses, and rocks.

From memory, there are trees, bushes and grass on Kerbin (not sure if they removed the bushes, or if they were just the old trees they replaced haha), and just rocks on the Mun. Not sure if there're any scatters on the other planets...
there are rocks on duna 2 , i usually play with scatters off bad computer
What command pod are you using in the picture?
Yep, there are rocks on Eve, some of them float 10m above the landscape.

From memory, there are trees, bushes and grass on Kerbin (not sure if they removed the bushes, or if they were just the old trees they replaced haha), and just rocks on the Mun. Not sure if there're any scatters on the other planets...
Ike has rocks, according to a guide for finding the magic boulder, but the mundane boulders might be gone now too.
I keep mine at 100% and it really doesn't cause much lag. In fact my bottleneck at the moment is rendering the HD textures from Better Atmospheres.
Fun fact (before the thread gets locked), apparently there is a very small chance for a Mun rock to appear as a sandcastle. It may just be on the main menu though.

It is not a rock, it is a regolith castle ... and appears in the splash screen at game start (suposedely 1 time in 40, but I haven't seen it in game for ages).

Now, on topic, there are some very interesting terrain features in some of the game moons if you activate terrain scatter ... say Pol:

[spoiler=for spoilers

]

From the wiki entry on Pol

Too bad that the plans of covering some of the system moons with giant crystals never gone out ...

jep, thatÃ‚Â´s why pol is my favorite

I think there are more bodys with terrain scatter, than without.
They all have rocks and stuff I think. Well, Laythe doesn't, but the rest do. Don't forget the cactus in the desert regions.
